select (select curr_date from ttrd_currdate) as 日期, i.i_name as 机构名称, tr.ord_id as 审批单号, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, dic.dict_value as 币种, TRIM(to_char(cast((tr.ordamount) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 金额, TRIM(to_char(cast((cashlb.mtr_set_amount) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 到期结算金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(instrument.coupon * 100 as decimal(31,6)),'990.9999')) as 年利率, TRIM(to_char(cast(cashlb.overdue_rate * 100 as decimal(31,6)),'990.9999')) as 逾期利率, cashlb.start_date as 起息日期, cashlb.mtr_date as 到期日期, cashlb.term as 期限, cashlb.i_name as 产品名称, case when instrument.payment_freq = '0D' then '利随本清' when instrument.payment_freq = '1Y' then '每年一次' when instrument.payment_freq = '6M' then '半年一次' when instrument.payment_freq = '3M' then '每季一次' when instrument.payment_freq = '1M' then '每月一次' when instrument.payment_freq = '-1' then '不结息' end as 付息频率, tr.operator as 经办人, cashlb.i_name as 产品名称, case when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/360' then 'A/360' when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/365' then 'A/365F' when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/365 (Fixed)' then 'A/365' when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/Actual (ISMA)' then 'A/A(ISMA)' when cashlb.daycount = '30/360 (Bond Basis)' then '30/360' end as 计息基准
FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr
LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type left join ttrd_instrument instrument on tr.i_code = instrument.i_code left join ttrd_cashlb cashlb on tr.i_code = cashlb.i_code left join ttrd_dict_mult_lang dic on instrument.currency = dic.dict_key and dic.dict_sub_type='currency' where tr.ord_id = (select distinct trr.ord_id FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE trr where trr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId}) and tr.ref_sysordid is null and tr.ordstatus<0
